TopicTitle: No Access to Mods or Addons

Articles.Content:
The last three days every time I select Mods or add on. I keep getting page can not be displayed. This includes try it through internet search engines directly.

Has the site been shut down?
Are you talking about the link at the top of the forum? It's working for me. I just tried it. Try clearing your browser caches.
I think he's referring to Spacedock as it seems down.

It is not space dock it is the in game link on first screen. That goes to the curse site. Tried to go the site through the internet no joy. I also tried space dock it did not work either.

Took your advice and tried clearing the cache still no joy.

Also tried link at the top of the forum still no joy.

Edited September 13, 2016 by Robert McDonnel
